note: PhD, science enthusiast, curious about the world & mostly fascinated about early development! Advocate for justice, fairness, kindness & the power of 1! My dream: no children left behind! Wish I had large enough arms to hug them all, but until then I try my best to contribute to a better world through my work! First generation academic, daughter of strong inspiring immigrants, learned to navigate the world through a childhood rare condition & visual impairment!
